title: Calories in a Hamburger Patty
meta_description: Find out calories in a hamburger patty (about 230 kcal for a standard beef one), plus protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition facts, and preparation tweaks.
assumptions: 80% lean ground beef, broiled or grilled, no added salt/seasonings, ~85g cooked weight (from 113g raw).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by meat leaness, cooking method, added ingredients, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard cooked hamburger patty provides ~230 kcal and ~22 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a hamburger patty?
faqs.a: About 230 kcal for a standard 80% lean beef patty, cooked.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a hamburger patty?
Does a leaner patty have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, a 90% lean patty drops to ~170 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a hamburger patty?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain beef patty.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a hamburger patty?
faqs.a: Grilling/broiling is lower calorie than frying, which adds ~40 kcal from oil.
